package.name: amazon-s3-online-storage
package.title: Amazon S3 Online Storage
package.description:
Amazon S3 Online Storage is a component of the Nuxeo platform that offers the option of storing files - the attachments that are uploaded within a content object, Nuxeo binaries - in an Amazon S3 bucket.
After installation, some configuration steps must be taken in order for this addon to be enabled and use the proper credentials. Check the linked page for installation instructions.
